belongs_to_collection.name: Planet of the Apes (TV Movie Collection)

original_title: Life, Liberty and Pursuit on the Planet of the Apes
overview: When fugitive human astronaut Virdon is shot, his chimp companion Galen must charm an old flame into accepting that a book on human surgery is no hoax. Meanwhile, their friend Burke is captured by the ape authorities and is to be brainwashed by a brilliant ape scientist named Wanda.  [The fourth of five telefilms edited from episodes of the 1974 TV series; this film combines the episodes "The Surgeon" and "The Interrogation"]
title: Life, Liberty and Pursuit on the Planet of the Apes
